title: Gift
body: Can someone please gift me kled :D.

replies.body: okk i will gift you kled if you gift me spirit udyr  first :D
why would we use our own money on someone we don't know?

Isn't that the basis of a date?

But what do I know? I play video games and don't go outside.
u dont wanna date someone wants to main kled anyway

If you don't use tinder (or maybe Grinder, in some cases), then you will have spent some time with that person beforehand.

btw, grinder is a gay tinder
im guessing because of your knowledge of this grinder you use it regularly ??
Or he just has a friend on it, or he has seen on of the many memes and reddit funnies about it. Even if he does use it, I'm not sure how it's really relevant.
Its only as relevant if you want it to be Seras-Chan ;) {{champion:240}}
For me? Never, I'm as far away from it's target audience as it gets :P
